== Welcome ==
Welcome to the wiki page of the West Bengal team. 

== Description ==
This group is meant for the users, techies and non-techies who wish to contribute to the open source platform of Ubuntu. We strongly encourage people to use Ubuntu and its flavours by making it easier to everyone.
